name: Spooky Sanitation
description:
SPOOKY SANITATION

//PART OF THE LOCALLY SOURCED WINTER BUNDLE

Welcome to your life as a night shift janitor.  Only one problem, the building is haunted.  Try your best to clean each floor before your shift is over.  If you leave too many messes then you will be fired.   Each week the ghosts try harder to get you fired.  See how long you can keep your job.  

ControlsWASD / Left JoystickMoveRight Click / Bottom Face ButtonPick up objectLeft Click / Right Face ButtonUse object

Created by RockPile Games

Credits

Luke Solt - Characters, Animations, 3d Art

Vincent Bey - Gameplay, Programming, Art

Looping Audio by Eric Matyas

Sound effects obtained from zapsplat.com
